lyrics.text: in the middle of the night
and you are in a place
it's impossible to change my feelings
impossible to get you out of my mind
and the spectrum of the memories
and you are afraid to blame me
and you are afraid to forget me
tell me where is your heart
tell me where is your heart
and made my thinking with you
the envelope made us a dimension
when you told me anything to change him
it's impossible to change my inner
i painted my life Beck harsh
from the days of innocence in our eyes
from the days the pain doesnt know our hearts
tell me where is your heart
tell me where is your heart
no matter how long and time passed
we'll be in the same place
but don't be silly for me
i want to see you but... where
Min ayyam mal waja3 may3araf gloubna
لما قولتيلي أي شي نتغلبوا عليه
من أيام ما البراءة في عيونا
من أيام ما الوجع ما يعرف قلوبنا
Translation (to the spirit, not to the letter because this is supremely difficult to translate):
My heart reveals to me, that you are my corruptor
My soul is for your redemption, whether you know it, or not
I Have nothing but my soul and the person who sacrifices himself
In the love of the person he adores, is never wasteful
The eye loves a visage of beauty that, my soul attains a hidden meaning with
The rain has no guilt, when the person that I love is with me
If it vanishes for a human, they're in my eye
For passion remains, and reunion is my temporizer
And patience is mortal, and congress is my detainer My detainer
If my soul was is in my hand, and I decided to gift it To the harbinger of your coming, I wouldn't do them justice Don't think me in love a phony, my blush with your coming is without artifice
I concealed your love, and it dressed me with grief Then, I swear upon my life, I nearly vanished Trepressed it from me, for if I revealed it I would find it more hidden than invisible amiability
For passion remains, and reunion is my temporizer And patience is mortal, and congress is my detainer My detainer
Passion defeated me, sol obeyed the command of my longing And in that process I defied the inhibition of my reprover From me to them. (from me to them) the humiliation of submission
And from them to me, the proudness of deniance and the might of a debilitator
For passion remains, and reunion is my temporizer And patience is mortal, and congress is my detainer My detainer

ma li siwaa ruwhi wbadhil nfsih
fi hub man yahwah lys bimusrif
ma llnnwaa dhnb wman ahwaa maey
min hyth fih esayt nhy muenify

روحي فِداكَ عرَفْتَ أمَ لم تَعْرِفِ
ما لي سِوَى روحي وباذِلُ نفسِهِ
في حُبّ مَن يَهْواهُ ليسَ بِمُسرِف
روحي بها تَصبو إلى مَغْنىً خَفي
ما للنّوَى ذنْبٌ ومَنْ أهوَى مَعي
إن غابَ عن إنسانِ عيني فهْوَ في
لو أَنّ رُوحي في يدي وَوَهَبْتُها
من حيثُ فيه عصَيتُ نهْيَ مُعنِّفي
مني لَهُ ذُلّ الخَضُوعِ ومنهُ لي
I hear music everywhere It overwhelms me with joy
I'm lost in the moment feeling each new beat
Letting myself go and dancing freely
Raising my hands and greeting the world from far away
I don't need anything else, this moment is everything
Standing on solid ground feels just like I'm floating
I'll do everything people said can't be done anymore
There's still more to go and I've got more to give
I hear the sound of music calling out to me
Spinning my soundtrack and going back to the start
I'll write a million beginnings to the story that I'm living
And I'll rewrite it all and start all over again
I'll soar to the skies and reach for the stars
Every time I get there I'll say one more time around
Once more for the sake of history, all the way to mars
With my arms wide open; give me everything you've got

people exhaust me .. they don’t get me
maybe because .. i’m like no one else
i’ll put on my shades .. listen to my music
and live my way .. even if it's a different way
they flip through my notebook .. trying to figure out my words
why so obsessed .. my story belongs to me
i will look after myself .. pamper myself
embrace myself .. and zone them out
